Action.Name: Index
Action.Title: 列表
Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01023"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01023/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01023/Detail',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01023/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button hide_Approved_申请中_已核准_招聘中_已结束" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGUpd('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01023/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button hide_Approved_申请中_已核准_招聘中_已结束" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01023/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-sendCheck" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button hide_Approved_申请中_已核准_招聘中_已结束" Options="iconCls:'icon-import',plain:true" Title="送签" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsMultiApprove('datagrid','送签','确认送签选择项？','Addition','/Approve/IntoApproveFlow')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-checkLog" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button hide_Approved_草稿" Options="iconCls:'icon-export',plain:true" Title="送签追踪" ActionValue="128" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlgLog('datagrid','送签追踪','/Page/P01023/CheckLog',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-over" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button hide_Approved_草稿_申请中_已结束" Options="iconCls:'icon-remove',plain:true" Title="结束招聘" ActionValue="26" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsOver('datagrid','结束','确认结束选择项？','/Page/P01023/Over',400,300)" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01023/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="AID"> <Column FieldName="AID" IsCheckBox="true" IsFixed="true" /> <Column Title="部门" FieldName="DeptName" /> <Column Title="职位" FieldName="Position" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="需求人数" FieldName="Need" /> <Column Title="申请理由" FieldName="Reason" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="期望到职日期" FieldName="AvailableDate" /> <Column Title="性别" FieldName="Sex" /> <Column Title="学历" FieldName="Degree" /> <Column Title="薪资范围" FieldName="SalaryRange" /> <Column Title="表单状态" FieldName="Approved" /> <Column Title="申请人" FieldName="UserName" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="申请日期" FieldName="ApplicationDate" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="CompanyID" /> <Parameter Name="State" Type="Const" DefaultValue="全部" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DeptID" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout TableClass="grid" /> <Fields> <Field Title="职位" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Position" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=LGetPosition&DeptID={@/Parameters[DeptID]}" /> </Field> <Field Title="招聘结果" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="AuditionRresult" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false" Binding="/Parameters[State]" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C023" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01023"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01023/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="查询" GroupName="人才管理" TableName="rc_Addition" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar"> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DeptID" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="CompanyID" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="EmployeeID" /> <Parameter Name="AuditionRresult" Path="Request[AuditionRresult]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Position" Path="Request[Position]" Type="Parameter" /> </ScalarCommand>

<QueryCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="返回结果" GroupName="人才管理" TableName="rc_Addition" CommandName="QueryPage"> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DeptID" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="CompanyID" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="EmployeeID" /> <Parameter Name="AuditionRresult" Path="Request[AuditionRresult]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Position" Path="Request[Position]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[查询].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[查询].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[查询].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="DeptName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="DeptName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="申请人" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UserName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="UserName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="招聘职位" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Position" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Position" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="申请理由" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Reason" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Reason" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="需求人数" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Need" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Need" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="申请日期" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="ApplicationDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ApplicationDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="期望到职" FieldType="TextBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="AvailableDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="AvailableDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="性别" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Sex" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Sex" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="学历" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Degree" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Degree" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="工作经验" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="YearsOfWorking" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="YearsOfWorking" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="薪资范围" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="SalaryRange" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="SalaryRange" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位职责" FieldClass="edit-field-w2" ContentClass="edit-content-w2" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Duty" Class="edit-input-w2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true" Binding="Duty" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-w2" ContentClass="edit-content-w2" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-w2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true" Binding="Remark" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01023"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="关闭" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Create
Action.Title: 新增
Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="CurrentDate" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="UserName" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="EmployeeName" /> <Parameter Name="DeptName" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DepartmentName" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DeptID" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout TableClass="grid" /> <Fields> <Field ColumnSpan="2" Title="部门" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="/Parameters[DeptName]" IsReadOnly="true" /> </Field> <Field ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="申请人" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="/Parameters[UserName]" IsReadOnly="true" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="1" ColumnSpan="2" Title="职位" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Position" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="mode:'remote',missingMessage:'请输入职位',invalidMessage:'职位不得超过20个字符',validType:'length[1,20]'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=LGetPosition&DeptID={@/Parameters[DeptID]}" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Page/P01023/GetDutyByPosition?Position='+rec.ID;
 $.ajax({
 url: url,
 type: 'post',
 success: function (result)
 {
var r=result.Data[0];
$('#Duty').textbox('setValue',r['Duty']);
 },
 error: function (d, error) {
 showError(error);
 }
 });
}" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="1" ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="申请理由" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Reason" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择申请理由'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C009" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="需求人数" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Need" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入人数',min:1,max:50,invalidMessage:'人数上限为50',validType:'length[1,2]'" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="2" ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="申请日期" FieldType="DateBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" ID="ApplicationDate" Name="ApplicationDate" Class="edit-input easyui-datebox " Binding="/Parameters[CurrentDate]" IsReadOnly="true" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="3" ColumnSpan="2" Title="期望到职" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="AvailableDate" Name="AvailableDate" Class="edit-input easyui-datebox" Options="missingMessage:'请选择预计到期日期',invalidMessage:'预计到期日期不得小于申请日期',validType:'dateCompare[\'#ApplicationDate\']'" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="3" ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="性别" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Sex" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择性别'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C039" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="4" ColumnSpan="2" Title="学历" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Degree" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择学历'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C006" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="4" ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="工作经验" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="YearsOfWorking" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择工作年限'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C022" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="5" ColumnSpan="2" Title="薪资范围" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="SalaryRange" Class="easyui-combobox edit-input" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择薪资范围'" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C010" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="5" ColumnIndex="2" ColumnSpan="2" Title="职位职责" FieldClass="edit-field-w2" ContentClass="edit-content-w2" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Duty" Name="Duty" Class="edit-input-w2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="prompt:'职位职责不得超过500个字符',missingMessage:'请输入职位职责',invalidMessage:'职位职责不得超过500个字符',validType:'length[1,500]',multiline:true" /> </Field> <Field RowIndex="6" ColumnSpan="2" Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-w2" ContentClass="edit-content-w2" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-w2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="prompt:'备注不得超过500个字符',invalidMessage:'备注不得超过500个字符',required:false,validType:'length[1,500]',multiline:true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01023"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" Action="submitAct_DGAppend('dataform', '/Page/P01023/Add', 'datagrid')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Add
Action.Title: 新增
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="新增人员返回数据" GroupName="人才管理" TableName="rc_Addition" CommandName="Add"> <Parameter Name="AID" Path="SerialCode" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="Addition,A,6" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="CompanyID" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="CurrentUserProfiles" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="DeptID" /> <Parameter Name="Position" Path="Request[Position]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Reason" Path="Request[Reason]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Need" Path="Request[Need]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ApplicationDate" Path="Request[ApplicationDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="AvailableDate" Path="Request[AvailableDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Sex" Path="Request[Sex]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Degree" Path="Request[Degree]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="YearsOfWorking" Path="Request[YearsOfWorking]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="SalaryRange" Path="Request[SalaryRange]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Duty" Path="Request[Duty]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsActive" Path="Request[IsActive]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="1" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[新增人员].Items" Type="Parameter"> <Validator /> <Validator /> <Validator /> </Parameter> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[新增人员].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[新增人员].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Update

<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[查看].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <ContentFooter><iframe tb="fl_EmployeeMove" id="af" onload="DynIframeSize('af')"></iframe> <script type="text/javascript"> InitIFrame(); </script></ContentFooter> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Name="UserName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="UserName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="招聘职位" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Position" easyui-textbox" Binding="Reason" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="需求人数" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Need" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Need" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="申请日期" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="ApplicationDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="ApplicationDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="期望到职日" FieldType="TextBox"> <DateBox Tag="input" Name="AvailableDate" Class="easyui-datebox edit-input" Binding="AvailableDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="性别" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Sex" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Sex" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="学历" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Degree" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Degree" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="工作经验" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="YearsOfWorking" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="YearsOfWorking" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="薪资范围" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="SalaryRange" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="SalaryRange" IsReadOnly="true" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true" Binding="Duty" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-w2" ContentClass="edit-content-w2" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-w2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true" Binding="Remark" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01023"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="关闭" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>
